TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 241
TEI.2.document_title: Moses Austin to G. W. Treat, 09-17-1814

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 241

div1.p: Due to G W. Treat or Beaver six hundred pounds of lead in ten days after date at my furnace house Mine A Burton 17th Sept 1814
